Berkeley.Maybeck High School:
Maybeck High School is a coeducational, independent, college preparatory high school located in Berkeley, California.


== History ==
Established in 1972, Maybeck High School is named after the regional architect Bernard Maybeck (1862–1957). Bernard Maybeck's concern for the environment and his appreciation for disciplined technique inspired his use of local natural materials and craftsmanship within the existing landscape.
